title: Harrowings skins for this year a bit lackluster?
body:
What happened? I used to look forward to the Harrowing/Christmas skins each year, they are usually great with a lot of wacky costumes and idea's behind them that remind me of the respective holidays they are themed after.

This year all three skins do not in the least seem that "Halloweeny" at all to me, they look like they are all from a regular skin line with all three skins look really really similar to each other instead of each one having it's own theme for that character related to Halloween or something. 

Why the change?

For those that don't know, 
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/10/1010-pbe-update.html
